casebody.data:
Hauser v. Metropolitan El. Ry. Co. et al. Becker v. Same. Hchus v. Same. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. May 4, 1891.) Appeal from special term.

Argued before Sedgwick, C. J., and McAdam, J.

Julien T. Davies and J. C. Thomson, for appellants. Charles Gibson Bennett, for respondent.

Per Curiam.

The judgment in these cases are severally affirmed, with costs.
